title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 2.55 - Receiving station requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 2.55 - Receiving station requirements

State Regulations
A receiving station shall comply with each of the items
required for a milk plant as set forth in this Part which are applicable to a
receiving station's activities. The partitioning requirement of Item 5p and the
requirements of Items 16p, 18p, 19p and 21p shall not apply. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
2.55

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
